content.question: The point of view expressed in the excerpt most directly contributes to a historical understanding of which of the following issues?

choices.label: The impact of new communications technologies on United States foreign relations
The influence of the development of atomic weaponry on United States diplomatic policy
The challenge posed to domestic economic growth by international migration
The role of the United States in the establishment of postwar peace settlements

content.answer: The role of the United States in the establishment of postwar peace settlements
